metadata.description: The apocalypse has been and gone. The age of humanity is at an end. Horrifying insectile aliens from the depths of infinite space are now masters of Earth!\nWhat does resistance mean, when there’s nothing left to fight for? That’s what Wayne, Jeremiah, and Soham, the only survivors of the devastating invasion, struggle with – seeing a glimpse of a future that justifies their futile presence on a ruined world.\nAs they pick through the remains of human civilization, keeping out of reach of the bugs, none of them suspecting that they are part of a much larger plan, one that involves another unknown survivor…
metadata.name: The Beautiful Death
